<template>
  <!-- <vue-json-editor v-model="resultInfo"
                   :showBtns="true"
                   :mode="'code'"
                   @json-change="onJsonChange"
                   @json-save="onJsonSave" /> -->
  <!-- <v-jsoneditor v-model="resultInfo" 
  :options="options"
  :plus="true"
  height="400px"
  @error="onError"></v-jsoneditor> -->
  <code-editor v-model="jsonStr" :auto-format="true" :smart-indent="true" theme="dracula" :indent-unit="4" :line-wrap="false" ref="editor"></code-editor>
</template>

<!-- <script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
// import vueJsonEditor from "vue-json-editor";
import VJsoneditor from 'v-jsoneditor/src/index'

const onJsonChange = (value) => {
  console.log("change:", value);
};
const onJsonSave = (value) => {
  console.log("save:", value);
};

const onError = () => {
  console.log('error')
}

const options = ref({
  mode: 'code'
})

const resultInfo = `{
  userId: "1111111129ac7325-30da-4e6a-8a00-9699820fc04a",
  realName: "18",
  gradeCode: "166",
  provinceCode: "110000",
  cityCode: {
    test1: "test1",
    test2: "test2",
  },
  schoolId: 21,
  schoolLevel: 1,
  // schoolName: "北京第二实验小学朝阳学校",
}`
</script> -->

<script>
  const jsonData =`{
    "employees": [{
      "firstName": "Bill",
      "lastName": "Gates"
    }, {
      "firstName": "George",
      "lastName": "Bush"
    }, {
      "firstName": "Thomas",
      "lastName": "Carter"
    }]
  }`
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        jsonStr:jsonData
      }
    },
    methods: {
      // 检测json格式
      isJSON(str) {
        if (typeof str == 'string') {
          try {
            var obj=JSON.parse(str);
            if(typeof obj == 'object' && obj ){
              return true;
            }else{
              return false;
            }
 
          } catch(e) {
            return false;
          }
        }else if (typeof str == 'object'  && str) {
          return true;
        }
      },
      onSubumit(){
        if (!this.isJSON(this.jsonStr)){
          this.$message.error(`json格式错误`)
          return false
        }
        this.$message.success('json格式正确')
      }
    }
  }
</script>
<style>
/* jsoneditor右上角默认有一个链接,加css去掉了 */
.jsoneditor-poweredBy {
  display: none;
}
</style>
